resources.string: Plan My Escape is an application developed by two students from UDL Igualada,
which is currently in the Beta phase, allowing you to easily and quickly plan and manage your trips.
Developed by the Plan My Escape team. All rights reserved,
and we have no issue using the law.
Welcome to Destinify. By accessing and using our app, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions.
If you do not agree with these terms, we ask that you do not use our app.
1. Use of the Application\nThe Destinify app allows you to plan and manage trips.
You agree to use this application only for legal purposes and in accordance with these Terms and Conditions.
The use of the app for illegal or unauthorized activities is prohibited.
2. Termination\nDestinify reserves the right to suspend or cancel your account at any time and without prior notice
if misuse of the app is detected or if you violate these terms.
3. Governing Law\nThese Terms and Conditions will be governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Spain,
without regard to its conflict of laws provisions.
Any disputes arising from these terms will be resolved in the competent courts of the Superior Court of Justice of Catalonia.
